name: Unfinished Kenney Jam 2020 Game!
description:
Controls:

A (left)          W (up)          S (down)          D (right)          Left Shift (dash)

Use Keys:

- (J)

- (K) 

- (L) 

The idea of the game was a adventure rhythmic game, where enemies were going to be spawned based on the music bits. Think on a combination of Patapon and limbo.


Why is it finished?

Well, during the gamejam, there was a storm on the Dominican Republic. We lost power during the entire weekend, and I couldn't work on the rest of the game or even upload this. lol

Will I continue working on this?

Maybe? I would love to make it true, but for this to become real, there should be some interest more than just me. <3


This game serves as a confirmation that I like developing 3D games too!!
